alert.note: Alert for Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 10:20PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Luverne affecting Rock County. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota... Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Sioux, Union and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Trent. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1496.0 feet, 478th Avenue and 242nd Street begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 1496.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM CDT Sunday was 1496.6 feet. This reading may be affected by ice in the river. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1495.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Trent 1495.0 1496.1 Sun 10 pm MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
